Package kademlia.routing

Interface KademliaRoutingTable

All Known Implementing Classes:
JKademliaRoutingTable
public interface KademliaRoutingTable
Specification for Kademlia's Routing Table
Since:
20140501

    • getBucketId

      int getBucketId​(KademliaId nid)
      Compute the bucket ID in which a given node should be placed; the bucketId is computed based on how far the node is away from the Local Node.
      Parameters:
      nid - The NodeId for which we want to find which bucket it belong to
      Returns:
      Integer The bucket ID in which the given node should be placed.

    • findClosest

      java.util.List<Node> findClosest​(KademliaId target, int numNodesRequired)
      Find the closest set of contacts to a given NodeId
      Parameters:
      target - The NodeId to find contacts close to
      numNodesRequired - The number of contacts to find
      Returns:
      List A List of contacts closest to target
